std_inline.citation:
'''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Johanna Christina van den Bergh"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Tulbagh, Baptism register, 1743 to 2 Feb 1800, page 190, entry number 31. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G4 7/1. Transcribed by Lynn Couperthwaite, Trysie Joubert, Richard Ball as part of the eGGSA Project, from VC 657, Cape Archives Repository
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Father with van den bergh anywhere in the surname with Abraham Paulus anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Johanna Christina van den Bergh baptism on 14 Apr 1782, daughter of Abraham Paulus van den Bergh & Handrina Jansen.

std_narrative.citation:
Johanna, daughter of Abraham Paulus van den Bergh & Handrina Jansen, was baptised on 14 April 1782. '''Baptism''': "eGGSA Baptism Registers, Johanna Christina van den Bergh"
Source: Nederduits Gereformeerde Gemeente (NGK), Tulbagh, Baptism register, 1743 to 2 Feb 1800, page 190, entry number 31. Repository: NG Kerkargief, Noordwal-Wes, Stellenbosch, G4 7/1. Transcribed by Lynn Couperthwaite, Trysie Joubert, Richard Ball as part of the eGGSA Project, from VC 657, Cape Archives Repository
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBaptisms.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Father with van den bergh anywhere in the surname with Abraham Paulus anywhere in the first name in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Johanna Christina van den Bergh baptism on 14 Apr 1782, daughter of Abraham Paulus van den Bergh & Handrina Jansen.
